scripts.start: concurrently "generate-textures src/images src/textures.ts" "generate-howls assets-src/sound src/sound src/sounds.ts" "generate-howls assets-src/music src/music src/musics.ts --dontPreload" "generate-json-exports src/levels src/levels.ts" "parcel src/index.html"
scripts.build: generate-howls assets-src/sound src/sound src/sounds.ts --build && generate-howls assets-src/music src/music src/musics.ts --dontPreload --build && parcel build --public-url ./ src/index.html
